raw_text: BERHARDT – (JUNE) MARIE THOMAZINE (nee LUDOWYK) – Dearly beloved wife of John Maurice,​ loving mother of Horace,​ Steuart,​ Jerome (all of Australia) Sherlock and Veron,​ mother-in-law of Romaine,​ Perin (Australia),​ Tracy and Delika,​ beloved grandmother of Kirk,​ Amanda,​ Dexter,​ Derick,​ Josh,​ Jadin,​ Natalie,​ Sherwyn,​ Trent,​ Delvin and Bomal,​ passed away peacefully on 10th October 2023. Remains will lie at A.F. Raymond Funeral Parlour from 9:00 a.m. to 10:00 p.m. on Friday,​ the 13th. Cortege leaves parlour at 4:00 p.m. on Saturday,​ 14th October for burial at The General Cemetery,​ Borella,​ Roman Catholic Section.065378

DE SILVA – NIHAL – Remains of our much loved husband,​ father,​ grandfather,​ brother,​ uncle and friend – Nihal Cyril Ignatius de Silva – will be at the A.F. Raymond’s Parlour on Friday,​ 13th October,​ from 8.30 a.m. – 4.30 p.m.,​ followed by Burial Service at 5.00 p.m. at the Borella Cemetery (Roman Catholic Section). Nihal was the devoted husband of Priyanthie,​ most beloved father of Ayesha,​ Dedunie and Marisa,​ father-in-law of Nalin and Anuruddha,​ grandfather of Liam,​ brother of Shirani (deceased),​ Carmen,​ Lakshman,​ Sharmi,​ Teddy and George and brother-in-law of Noel,​Neville,​ Shirani,​ Naomal,​ Sirilin and Sweena. “He was our North,​ our South,​ our East and West and he will live in our hearts for eternity !”065729

LIYANAARACHCHI – LAL (Retired Director General,​ Civil Aviation Authority,​ member of SLAS),​ dearly beloved husband of Chandrani (nee Dissanayake),​ loving father of Muditha,​ Denuka (Australia),​ father-in-law of Nadeeka,​ brother of Deepal,​ Nimal,​ Daya and Nihal,​ brother-in-law of Ajantha,​ late Ramya,​ Daya and Vijitha,​ passed away peacefully on the 10th of October 2023. Remains will lie at A.F. Raymond Funeral Parlour on Friday,​ the 13th of October,​ from 9.00 a.m. to 10.00 p.m. Cortege leaves parlour at 10.30 a.m. on Saturday,​ the 14th of October,​ for cremation at 11.00 a.m. at the General Cemetery,​ Borella (Old Crematorium). Tel. Muditha Liyanaarachchi – 0703221898.065329

PERERA – CHANDRANI SUNETH – (Retired Commissioner of Probation). It is with great sorrow that the death is announced of CHANDRANI SUNETH PERERA of No. 15/​1,​ off Seram Road,​ Mount Lavinia at the age of 94. She was the only daughter of Ex Senator late Mr M.P. De Zoysa and the mother of D.A.R.D. Dolewatta. Her remains will lie at Jayaratne Funeral Parlour,​ Borella from 10 a.m. to 4.00 p.m. on 14th Oct. 2023. Funeral at the General Cemetery,​ Borella at 4.30 p.m. on the same day. Informant – Mrs D.A.R.D. Dolewatta.064901

UDUWAWALA – PADMINI – Beloved wife of the late Edmund Uduwawala,​ loving mother of Nalin (UK),​ Nirmala and Senaka,​ mother-in-law of Chrishanthi and Nilakshi,​ grandmother of Shamendra and Rosy,​ Chandi and Jessica Sewwandhi and Nipuna,​ Nelum and Heshan,​ great grandmother of Thilini and Eshin,​ expired. Cremation on Saturday,​ 14th October at Mahaiyawa Cemetery,​ Kandy at 1.00 p.m. Cortege leaves residence : 52,​ Bahirawakanda Path,​ Kandy at 12 p.m.065793
